chat.server.protocol

Interface SessionItf

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Session

    public interface SessionItf
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The Interface SessionItf is the interface used by the class Session.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean connect(java.lang.String login, OutputItf output)
      Method used by a client to connect to the Session as a user.
      boolean disconnect(java.lang.String login)
      Method used by a client to disconnect from the Session.
      boolean receiveAll(java.lang.String content, java.lang.String login)
      Method used by client when he send a message to all users of the chat.
      boolean receivePrivate(java.lang.String content, java.lang.String loginRec, java.lang.String loginExp)
      Method used by client when he send a private message to one of a connected user.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        boolean connect(java.lang.String login,
                OutputItf output)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used by a client to connect to the Session as a user.
        Parameters:
        login - the login of the user
        output - the output of the user
        Returns:
        true, if the connection is successful
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - the remote exception

      • disconnect

        boolean disconnect(java.lang.String login)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used by a client to disconnect from the Session.
        Parameters:
        login - the login of the user
        Returns:
        true, if the disconnection is successful
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - the remote exception

      • receiveAll

        boolean receiveAll(java.lang.String content,
                   java.lang.String login)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used by client when he send a message to all users of the chat.
        Parameters:
        content - the content of the message
        login - the login of the user that send the message
        Returns:
        true, if the message have been correctly sent
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - the remote exception

      • receivePrivate

        boolean receivePrivate(java.lang.String content,
                       java.lang.String loginRec,
                       java.lang.String loginExp)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used by client when he send a private message to one of a connected user.
        Parameters:
        content - the content of the message
        loginRec - the login of the receiver of the message
        loginExp - the login of the user that send the private message
        Returns:
        true, if the message have been correctly sent
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - the remote exception
